programme.title: Alligator
programme.desc: A flushed baby alligator survives on hormone-filled lab rats, grows giant, and unleashes chaos in Chicago.

programme.title: Uninvited
programme.desc: A cat injected with a genetically-engineered virus escapes a laboratory and stows away on a criminal's yacht.

programme.title: Dog Soldiers
programme.desc: A routine military exercise turns into a nightmare in the Scotland wilderness.

programme.title: Phantasm: Remastered
programme.desc: The residents of a small town have begun dying under strange circumstances, leading young Mike to investigate.

programme.title: Phantasm 3: Lord of the Dead
programme.desc: Mike and Reggie continue to hunt the mysterious Tall Man, discovering that the invasion has already begun.

programme.title: Phantasm 4: Oblivion
programme.desc: Mike again escapes from the Tall Man and travels through time to learn more about his nemesis.

programme.title: Phantasm 5: Ravager
programme.desc: Reggie wanders through the desert, but suddenly awakes in a different dimension.

programme.title: Night of the Living Dead
programme.desc: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the East Coast of the United States.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre
programme.sub-title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: Maneater of Hydra
programme.desc: A group of tourists pays to spend time exploring a lush island, but their blood will feed the demented Baron's carnivorous plants.

programme.title: Better Watch Out
programme.desc: While babysitting at Christmas, Ashley is forced to defend herself and the child against unwelcome intruders.

programme.title: Summer of 84
programme.desc: Teenager Davey Armstrong is a conspiracy theorist who begins to suspect that a neighbouring police officer is a serial killer.

programme.title: Sorority House Massacre
programme.desc: College student Beth and her sorority sisters are stalked by an escaped psychopathic killer who shares a strange telepathic link with her.

programme.title: Sweet 16
programme.desc: Melissa tries to make friends in her new town, but each of the boys she spends time with is found murdered.
